name: Cave Explorer (Blood Moon Interactive)
description:
Cave explorer is a 2D platformer style exploration game with 5 levels. The player is encouraged to explore the cave and find gems and other hidden treasures while battling enemies and avoiding hazards. 

This is the first game I've completed using Gamemaker Studio 2. All assets used were made available for free and I have provided credits to every one of them. I am not accepting any donations for this game as it is really short and was just something I did to learn the software. If you enjoy the game or have feedback I'm open to hearing your comments.
